overview: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is now rolling out in public preview in GitHub Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is now rolling out in public preview in GitHub Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Availability in GitHub Copilot
bullets: OpenAI’s GPT-5.1-Codex-Max will be available to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise.
You’ll be able to select the model in the Copilot Chat model picker from:
Visual Studio Code in all modes: chat, ask, edit, agent
Copilot Chat in GitHub Mobile (iOS and Android)
Rollout will be gradual. If you don’t see the new models yet, check back soon.

detailed_explanation.title: Enabling access
bullets: Enterprise and Business plans : Administrators must enable the GPT-5.1-Codex-Max policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see the respective model in the Copilot Chat model picker.
Pro and Pro+ plans : Users can enable the model by selecting it in the model picker and confirming the one-time prompt.
Bring your own key : Select Manage Models from the picker, choose GPT-5.1-Codex-Max, and enter your API key when prompted.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn more
bullets: To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see our documentation on models and get started with Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.

impact: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is now rolling out in public preview in GitHub Copilot.
